    "SSRewardText": "The poor kid is burnt to a crisp, you're not sure if he was alive before you burned him... that doesn't change the fact that he's dead.\n\nBesides the boy, there is a half-burned chest in the hole, that is perhaps the reason why the boy was there. You bury the child and open the chest.\n\nYou told the baker that you would find his son, and you found him... but you are sure that it was not the result he expected when he asked for your help.",
